  • plot

plot#

This page gives an overview of all public discrimintools plotting functions.

CANDISC#

plot.fviz_candisc(obj[, element])

Visualize Canonical Discriminant Analysis (CANDISC)

plot.fviz_candisc_biplot(obj[, axis, ...])

Visualize Canonical Discriminant Analysis (CANDISC) - Biplot of individuals and variables

plot.fviz_candisc_ind(obj[, axis, geom_ind, ...])

Visualize Canonical Discriminant Analysis (CANDISC) - Graph of individuals

plot.fviz_candisc_var(obj[, axis, geom, ...])

Visualize Canonical Discriminant Analysis (CANDISC) - Graph of variables

DiCA#

plot.fviz_dica(obj[, element])

Visualize Discriminant Correspondence Analysis (DiCA)

plot.fviz_dica_biplot(obj[, axis, geom_ind, ...])

Visualize Discriminant Correspondence Analysis (DiCA) - Biplot of individuals and variables

plot.fviz_dica_ind(obj[, axis, geom_ind, ...])

Visualize Discriminant Correspondence Analysis (DiCA) - Graph of individuals

plot.fviz_dica_quali_var(obj[, axis, ...])

Visualize Discriminant Correspondence Analysis (DiCA) - Graph of qualitative variables

plot.fviz_dica_var(obj[, axis, geom_var, ...])

Visualize Discriminant Correspondence Analysis (DiCA) - Graph of variables/categories

Distance#

plot.fviz_dist(obj[, axis, geom, repel, ...])

Visualize distance between barycenter

PLSR#

plot.fviz_plsr(obj[, element])

Visualize Partial Least Squares Regression (CPLS, PLSDA, PLSLDA, PLSLOGIT)

plot.fviz_plsr_ind(obj[, axis, geom_ind, ...])

Visualize Partial Least Squares Regression - Graph of individuals

plot.fviz_plsr_var(obj[, axis, geom, repel, ...])

Visualize Partial Least Squares Regression - Graph of variables

Others#

plot.add_scatter(p, data[, axis, geom, ...])

Add elements points and/or texts to plotnine graph

plot.fviz_circle(p[, r, x0, y0, color])

Add a circle with plotnine

plot.overlap_coord(coord, x_name, y_name, repel)

Overlap text position for segment

plot.set_axis(p[, x_lim, y_lim, x_label, ...])

Set axis to plotnine graph
